title: Did you have or work a notice period?
h1: Did you have or work a notice period?
insetText1: Tell us how long your notice period was. If you're not sure, check the terms and conditions of your employment contract.
insetText2: Tell us how much of your notice period you're being paid for.
hint1: Tell us how long your notice period was. If you're not sure, check the terms and conditions of your employment contract.
hint2: Tell us how much of your notice period you're being paid for.
